name: Hunts Point DIY
description: Bronx DIY spot built by local skaters in Hunts Point industrial area. Gritty and authentic.
history: Started as an abandoned lot turned skate haven. Community maintains and evolves it.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include DIY ramps, flat bars, manual pads, creative features. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Bronx skate scene in Hunts Point. Started as an abandoned lot turned skate haven. Community maintains and evolves it.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 6 to Hunts Point Ave.. Weekends when crews are active.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
